Detailed Description

a node containing a value within the MIB tree.

Field Documentation

MIBHandler_ChangeCallback IPDR_tag_MIBNode::ChangeCallback
 

void* IPDR_tag_MIBNode::ChangeCallbackArg
 

Argument to ChangeCallback.

DynamicArray IPDR_tag_MIBNode::ChildNodes
 

struct IPDR_tag_MIBNode* IPDR_tag_MIBNode::Parent
 

Callback for handling changes in the MIB: applies to this node and all its children.

IPDR_BOOL IPDR_tag_MIBNode::Persistent
 

indicates whether the node and its child nodes should be stored between stop/start of the client.

unsigned int IPDR_tag_MIBNode::Type
 

The type of the node -> this can be any IPDR type.

char* IPDR_tag_MIBNode::Value
 

Actual value of the node (all nodes are represented as strings) ... if ValueCallback is defined, this is ignored.

MIBHandler_ValueCallback IPDR_tag_MIBNode::ValueCallback
 

void* IPDR_tag_MIBNode::ValueCallbackArg
 

Argument to ValueCallback.

IPDR_BOOL IPDR_tag_MIBNode::Writable
 

TRUE if the value of the node can be changed (by an SNMP SET command, via MIBHAndler_ExternalSet(), which is called from IPDR_MIBSet()).
